quizInfo.Subject: nformation Assurance & Security (Cybersecurity Fundamentals)
quizInfo.Title: Cybersecurity Professionals and Their Tasks || 01 Handout 1
References: Cybersecurity Professionals and Their Tasks || 01 Handout 1

quizData.question: What is the practice of protecting systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks?
What is usually aimed at accessing, changing, or destroying sensitive information; extorting money from users; or interrupting normal business processes?
A successful cybersecurity approach has what kind of protection spread across the computers?
quizData.answer: has multiple layers of protection spread across the computers
choices: has a single layer of protection spread across the computers
has a single layer of protection spread across the network
has a firewall made of cheese
has multiple layers of protection spread across the computers

quizData.question: In an organization, what must all complement one another to create an effective defense from cyber attacks?
Which is one of the tasks of cybersecurity professionals?
quizData.answer: Utilizing every type of medium to stay on top of technology and security threats
choices: Utilizing every type of medium to stay on top of technology and security threats

quizData.question: Which is one of the tasks of cybersecurity professionals?
quizData.answer: Being aware through analyzing and evaluating threats
choices: Being aware through analyzing and evaluating threats

quizData.question: Which is one of the tasks of cybersecurity professionals?
quizData.answer: Going through all the systems to check for any potential issue
choices: Going through all the systems to check for any potential issue

quizData.question: Which is one of the tasks of cybersecurity professionals?
quizData.answer: Putting proper security measures in place and establishing a protocol
choices: Putting proper security measures in place and establishing a protocol

quizData.question: Which is one of the tasks of cybersecurity professionals?
Which is one of the tasks of cybersecurity professionals?
quizData.answer: Spreading the word about security and its importance throughout the company
choices: Spreading the word about security and its importance throughout the company

quizData.question: Who is responsible for maintaining the security of a company's computer system?
Who must think like a hacker would to anticipate their moves and tactics?
Who sometimes has to work odd hours and must constantly stay updated on the latest developments in security and hacking?
IT experts feel that the best of which profession are former hackers since they are adept at understanding how the hackers operate?
Who works as an advisor and supervisor for all security measures necessary to protect a company's assets?
Who uses their knowledge to assess possible security threats and breaches for prevention?
Who creates contingency protocols and plans for when security violations occur?
Who is an information security expert who systematically attempts to penetrate systems to find vulnerabilities?
Who is also referred to as a white hat hacker?
Who is responsible for an organization's information and data security?
Whose job is it to learn what day-to-day responsibilities will fall under its umbrella, such as security operations, data loss, program management, and access management?
How many common cybersecurity career paths are outlined in the handout?
